  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_455</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_455</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Triángulos</string>
            <string language="en">Triangles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreiecke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Triangles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Triângulos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Triangoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίγωνα</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los triángulos en el plano. Se estudian, desde un punto de vista sintético, la construcción de triángulos en el plano y las rectas y puntos notables de un triángulo.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to teach triangles on the plane. The construction of triangles on the plane and the lines and points associated with them are studied from a synthetic point of view.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">recta notable</string>
            <string language="en">associated line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">baricentro</string>
            <string language="en">barycenter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ortocentro</string>
            <string language="en">orthocenter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">circuncentro</string>
            <string language="en">circumcenter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">incentro</string>
            <string language="en">incenter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Dreiecke auf der Fläche zu unterrichten. Der 
Aufbau der Dreiecke auf der Fläche und den Zeilen und die Punkte, die
mit ihnen verbunden sind, werden von einem synthetischen Gesichtspunkt
studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'enseigner des triangles sur l'avion. La 
construction des triangles sur l'avion et les lignes et des points 
liés à eux sont étudiés d'un point de vue synthétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações ensinar 
triângulos no plano. A construção dos triângulos no plano e 
nas linhas e os pontos associados com eles são estudados de um ponto 
sintético da vista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
insegnare i triangoli sull'aereo. La costruzione dei triangoli 
sull'aereo e sulle righe ed i punti connessi con loro sono studiati da
un punto di vista sintetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να διδάξει τα τρίγωνα στο αεροπλάνο. Η κατασκευή των 
τριγώνων στο αεροπλάνο και τις γραμμές και τα σημεία που 
συνδέονται με τους μελετώνται από συνθετική άποψη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verbundene Zeile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">barycenter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
